Package com.developersboard.backend.service.storage.impl

Class AbstractAmazonS3Service

java.lang.Object
com.developersboard.backend.service.storage.impl.AbstractAmazonS3Service
All Implemented Interfaces:
AmazonS3Service
Direct Known Subclasses:
AmazonS3ServiceImpl, MockAmazonS3ServiceImpl
public abstract class AbstractAmazonS3Service extends Object implements AmazonS3Service
This abstract class provides some operations available to Amazon S3 already implemented.
Since:
1.0

    • storeFileToS3

      protected String storeFileToS3(File resource, String path, String fileName, com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 s3Client, AwsProperties properties) throws InterruptedException
      It stores the given file name in S3 and returns the key under which the file has been stored.
      Parameters:
      resource - The file resource to upload to S3
      path - The folder within which this file will be placed
      fileName - The file name e.g. fileName.png
      s3Client - the amazonS3 object
      properties - the AWS properties
      Returns:
      The URL of the uploaded resource or null if a problem occurred
      Throws:
      com.amazonaws.services.s3.model.AmazonS3Exception - If something goes wrong.
      InterruptedException - if there is any interruption during upload
